channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @kptzr @WarMonitor3 … the landings, however, are sometimes fixed targets (until new ones are established, of course)
item.source:markdown: @kptzr @WarMonitor3 … the landings, however, are sometimes fixed targets (until new ones are established, of course)

item.description:
@knightlight001 @TrentTelenko @PhillipsPOBrien Range is needed to deal with the full universe of potential threats. S-400 can still attack low-altitude targets closer to system, especially when placed close to high-value targets; UKR is just operating out of range.

Air superiority is supposed to deal with distant threats.
item.source:markdown:
@knightlight001 @TrentTelenko @PhillipsPOBrien Range is needed to deal with the full universe of potential threats. S-400 can still attack low-altitude targets closer to system, especially when placed close to high-value targets; UKR is just operating out of range.
Air superiority is ~supposed~ to deal with distant threats.
